text: The following is a list of episodes of the American sitcom Amen, which aired from September 27, 1986, until May 11, 1991, on NBC. 110 episodes have aired over five seasons. == Series overview == ==Episodes== === Season 1 (1986–87) === === Season 2 (1987–88) === === Season 3 (1988–89) === === Season 4 (1989–90) === === Season 5 (1990–91) === ==External links== * * Category:Lists of American sitcom episodes
